column5: Dropped in to the Vaughan Sail store today, and there was a sale bin of various Rapala lures all priced at $5.99 Picked up a couple, might go back for some more.
How's the selection?  Was it part of the 80yr anniversary promo?
Cool. I see CT has PowerPro on for 20% off
How's the selection?  Was it part of the 80yr anniversary promo?  I noticed more than a half dozen different types in the bin. And they all have the 80th anniversary stickers on them.
I was at the Etobicoke location about a month ago and they only had these.  I wish I was there when they had more stock.

Have to wonder if someone found a "golden" one and didn't even look at it for that but just wanted the lure for the price and picked some up to replace lost lures and or got it as a gift for someone.  If I was given one as a gift I sure wouldn't be thinking "does it have gold font?" for the Rapala paint job on the body...  Still a good deal for those that use those lures for sure.  So much for me selling all mine @ $5 each...
